raw.question: Sequential pattern matching for inline markdown instead of single complex regex
raw.chosen: Sequential pattern matching for inline markdown instead of single complex regex
raw.reasoning: Avoids lookbehind/lookahead which has spotty browser support. Processes patterns in order of precedence (bold before italic) for reliable matching.

retrospective.summary: Added full markdown support to messageFormatting.tsx: headings (#-######), bold (**text**), italic (*text*), strikethrough (~~text~~), lists (- and 1.), markdown links, and improved existing code blocks/blockquotes. Created 34 comprehensive tests. Fixed heading size visibility by using inline styles to override parent text-sm class.
